update mds_ementidcontentinfo set baseelementid = #{baseelementid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dailyprice = #{dailyprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, zkrate = #{zkrate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, realprice = #{realprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, reprice = #{reprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update mds_ementidcontentinfo me set me.isdel = '1' where me.goodsdetailid = #{goodsdetailid}
mapper.select: select me.*,mb.name from mds_ementidcontentinfo me join mds_baseelement mb on mb.id = me.baseelementid where me.isdel = '0' and me.goodsdetailid = #{goodsdetailid} order by me.sort
